problem: SDP workflow has two major bottlenecks: (1) PR approval gate blocks autonomous execution, causing 80% of cycle time delays, and (2) @idea interview takes 15-20 minutes with 6-12 questions, overwhelming users. Current 4-WS feature takes ~3h 45m from idea to deployment.

users.needs: Rapid feedback cycles without waiting for PR approval
Autonomous execution without human-in-the-loop for trusted features
pain_points: Cannot deploy to sandbox for testing without PR

success_criteria.target: Users successfully use --auto-approve for trusted deployments
5x improvement in features completed per day

goals: Remove PR approval bottleneck with multiple execution modes
Streamline @idea interview to 3-5 critical questions with optional deep dive
Maintain quality gates while enabling faster execution
Provide safe modes (--sandbox, --dry-run) for risk mitigation
non_goals: Removing quality gates (coverage, LOC, type hints remain)
Removing @review step (still required for quality check)
Removing human oversight entirely (just making it optional)

modes.use_case: Trusted features, sandbox environments, rapid iteration

modes.behavior: Skip PR, deploy to sandbox environment only

round_1.focus: Mission, users, technical approach, risk level

risk_mitigation.quality_gates: Enforce coverage, LOC, type hints regardless of mode
risk_mitigation.destructive_confirmation: Require manual confirmation for database changes, deletions
risk_mitigation.audit_logging: Log all --auto-approve executions with timestamp and user
risk_mitigation.dry_run: --dry-run flag to preview changes without execution
